sourcesContent:
Client ID Client Name Client Date of Birth Client SSN
{{ client.id }} {{ client.lastName + ", " + client.firstName + " " + client.middleName }} {{ client.dobMonth + " " + client.dobDay + ", " + client.dobYear}} {{ client.firstThreeSsn + "-" + client.middleTwoSsn + "-" + client.lastFourSsn }}
